formitem.title: Form Item
formitem.subtitle: Universal component for creating form fields with labels, validation and accessibility support

basic.title: Basic Example
basic.description: Basic form item state with label and input field. Label is set by the `label` property

required.title: Required Field
required.description: Required fields are marked with an asterisk (*) using the `required` property

withError.title: With Error
withError.description: Validation error messages are displayed using the `errorMessage` property

customLabel.title: Custom Label
customLabel.description: Custom label content can be set via the `labelSlot` slot

customError.title: Custom Error
customError.description: Custom error display can be configured via the `error` slot

withFor.title: Field Association
withFor.description: The `for` property allows linking the label to a specific form element for improved accessibility

form.title: Form Example
form.description: Complete example of using FormItem in a contact form with validation and various field types

argTypes.label: Label text for form field
argTypes.required: Required field. Adds asterisk (*) to label
argTypes.for: ID of element that label is associated with (for accessibility)
argTypes.default: Main slot for form field content (e.g., CInput, CSelect, etc.)
argTypes.error: Slot for custom error display. Receives object with error field
argTypes.labelSlot: Slot for custom label content. Receives object with label field
